name: SS(2) 678 MCQs Gujarat
description: Pankajsid34 presents the Gujarati Quiz android app for Social Science Subject of Std.-6, 7, 8 Second Sem. Star Features of the app are given below.   Features :- - Simple GUI & great look. - This is an online android app with low size up to 3.6 mb only. - You can play chapter wise quiz of class 6, 7, 8 Social Science, Second sem. - There are 1900+ MCQ questions included in this game. (Average 49 Questions Per Chapter) - And more Questions will be added in Future, without App Update.... - Playing a unit quiz again, each time there will be new questions. - You can see right answer at the same time with know answer button if your answer is wrong. - See overview, Result and Response with Grade for all questions you play at the end of the quiz. - There is not any disturbance of Advertisement in this app. - This is very useful app for Primary School Students & Teachers also. - This App can be used for Exercise, Evaluation & also for Remedial work. - Also useful for competitive exams like TET, TAT, GPSC, UPSC, LIC, SSC, Bank, Post etc and Scholarship Exams Like NMMS, SSE etc  Your mobile must be Gujarati Supported for this app and keep your Mobiles Font Size normal for best view. Minimum Requirement: - 1 GB RAM and 100 kbps internet speed and  5 inch or bigger Screen Size. Minimum Android Version: - Android 5.0 L  Visit our website for more Educational Materials. Links are given below. Website - https://pankajsid34.blogspot.com Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/c/Pankajsid34 Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Pankajsid34 Telegram - http://telegram.me/Pankajsid34  App Designed & Created by Parmar Pankaj
